data.name: Deliver Us The Moon: Fortuna - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Relive and experience the game’s atmosphere again with nearly 3 hours of original music composed for Deliver Us The Moon: Fortuna.

1. Prelude
2. Interlude: Awakening
3. Separation
4. Preparations
5. Revival - Part 1
6. Prime
7. Revival - Part 2
8. Revival: reprise
9. Pale Blue Dot
10. A Pearl In The Dark
11. Interlude: Arrival
12. Procedures
13. Weightless
14. First Light
15. Sidereal Winds
16. Omen
17. Warnings and Alarms
18. The Breach
19. Interlude: Into The Night
20. Interlude: Descent
21. Nadir
22. A Spark of Life
23. Cenotaph
24. The Void Receives
25. Companion
26. Adrift
27. The Lunar Wastes
28. Interlude: Aligning the stars
29. A Place We Called Home
30. Daybreak
31. Stargazer
32. Interlude: Resurgence
33. Nightfall
34. Interlude: Another Destination
35. Solace
36. Desolace
37. Time Ticks Away
38. Interlude: Hanging By A Thread
39. Sarah's Resolve
40. Recession
41. Precipice
42. Sarah's Song (feat. Nola Klop)
43. Outskirts - Bonus Track
44. Start the Mission - Bonus Track
45. Go Gentle Into That Good Night - Bonus Track
46. The Premise - Trailer Track
47. A New Dawn - Trailer Track
48. The Mission - Trailer Track
49. Blackout - Trailer Track
50. Goodbye - Trailer Track

data.short_description: Relive and experience the game’s atmosphere again with nearly 3 hours of original music composed for Deliver Us The Moon: Fortuna.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Anything that plays sound
  • Processor: 1Ghz and up
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Not required
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: We recommend stereo
